lines.text: Come here. Just the bitch I was looking for!
Happy Halloween, Bitch!
I'm getting ready for Halloween.
You see that i can kill you at will. I can take your lives, but not your souls. Those must be given to me, by word or deed.
You're on the law... and it's time to pronounce sentence.
Good Evening, Officer
You startled me. What are you doing here?
Because of the murders.
Murders?
A few years back, Halloween night to be exact.
Group of kids from St. Rita's Academy got massacred here.
Here? Oh God, how awful!
I'm sorry, you're gonna have to leave.
Says who?
And you better get a bottle of mouthwash, cause your breath smells like you've been eating some stale carpet.
What's that suppose to mean?
Well, if I was eating at the Y, I'd like to see who else is sampling the cuisine.
Open wide and give me some tongue.
Give him a break, that's probably the closest he'll ever come to a wet hole.
Excuse me, but i've been such a scatterbrain lately!
Hey Nick, got a friend for me, or shall we make it a threesome?

[while trying to get the car to work]
Ok, try again.
Can't you fix it?
What do i look like, Mr. Goodrich?
You're the one who took auto shop.
[Inside the van]
[startles Vince and Lois with a fake snake hand]
Trick or treat Lois!

[annoyed]
What the fuck is wrong with you, ah Reggie?
It was a joke Vince. Relax!
It's kinda cute, thanks.
Yeah sure, glad you like it

[Goes inside Hull House searching for Holly]
Holly, are you up there?
Abbie! Over here. Follow me. C'mon let's go.
How'd you get away?
It wasn't hard.

[running outside the house to hide from Vince]
Wait, Reggie is over there.
No, later. We've got to hide.

[Inside the small church]
What are we doing in here?
Nick got away from Vince.
Great! Let's go find them.
Don't you realize? The minute you leave here, you go back to been Holly the cheerleader's cute little friend or cute little shadow but nobody that has to try twice as hard to get know has this much.
The kind of woman that Vince would find completely irresistible...
You can help me do that?
Do you want me to?
Aha.
[Angela gets closer and kisses her]

[annoyed]
Please don't.
[Angela insisting]
Look i can't. Stop it!
[throws Angela on the floor]

[laughing]
Too late, you already made your choice.
What are you talking about?
[Angela turns around and shows her real face]
C'mon children, morning is almost here. It's time to return to the bowels of hell!
